long_description: SkinFare Thunder Cake balm, with nutmeg, clove and anise essential oils, soothes your dry skin and eases stiff muscles and joints after a long day on the trail or a tough workout at the gym. Also works well after shaving to prevent razor burn. SkinFare Thunder Cake balm is USDA certified organic. Packaging is biodegradable.
short_description: SkinFare Thunder Cake balm, with nutmeg, clove and anise essential oils, soothes your dry skin and eases stiff muscles and joints after a long day on the trail or a tough workout at the gym.
